name: PublishAIEvaluationReport
description: Publishes an AI evaluation report generated by Microsoft.AI.Testing to Azure DevOps

inputs.name: reportFile
inputs.label: Report File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from repo root to the JSON report data file to publish. Supports wildcards.

inputs.name: disableAttachmentUpload
inputs.label: Don't upload attachment.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Disables uploading attachments, instead relying on the report data to be uploaded manually.
